name: Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution, 0.07%
indications: Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution, 0.07% is indicated for the treatment of postoperative inflammation and reduction of ocular pain in patients who have undergone cataract surgery.
contraindications: Instill one drop into the affected eye once daily beginning 1 day prior to surgery, continued on the day of surgery, and through the first 14 days post-surgery. ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions:
Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution, 0.07% is supplied in a white opaque LDPE plastic bottle with a white translucent LDPE dropper and gray opaque HDPE plastic cap as follows:
                  • 1.6 mL in a 5 mL container (NDC 60505-1006-1)
                  • 3 mL in a 5 mL container (NDC 60505-1006-2)
                  
                     Storage: Store at 20ºC to 25ºC (68ºF to 77ºF) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
